pr_title: Move classes from build scripts to buildSrc

timeline.bodyText:
Man, this whole thing is a goofy hack. It's really just so we can alias :distribution:run as simply run and still pass along the CLI options.
@rjernst since pretty much everyone just uses ./gradlew :run why don't we just move that task to the root project rather than creation it in the :distribution project and do this weird aliasing nonsense?
timeline.author: mark-vieira

replies.bodyText: That's fine I guess. It means pulling in testclusters into the root project.
replies.author: rjernst

replies.bodyText: I've changed this and moved all related to this into gradle/run.gradle script and apply it on the root project now
replies.author: breskeby

replies.bodyText:
It means pulling in testclusters into the root project.

I think that's fine, and a net-zero since we can then remove that plugin from the :distribution project.
replies.author: mark-vieira
